S04bsu032_u:3: Vaidya n = pagination of P.L. Vaidya's edition (added by Klaus Wille)
S04bsu032_u:4: NOTE: Where a page break occurs within a word,
S04bsu032_u:6: shifted to the end of the word in order not to interfere with word search.
S04bsu032_u:12_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā
S04bsu032_u:14_0: mahāmaudgalyāyanena ca mahākāśyapena ca mahākapphiṇena ca mahākātyāyanena ca mahākauṣṭhilena
S04bsu032_u:14_1: ca revatena ca śuddhipanthakena ca nandena ca ānandena ca rāhulena ca gavāṃpatinā
S04bsu032_u:14_2: ca bharadvājena ca kālodayinā ca vakkulena ca aniruddhena ca /
S04bsu032_u:26_0: Sukhs_2 tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayati sma - asti śāriputra
S04bsu032_u:26_1: paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetraṃ koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhākṣetrāṇāmatikramya sukhāvatī nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu032_u:27: tatra amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S04bsu032_u:28: dharmaṃ ca deśayati tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatītyucyate?
S04bsu032_u:29: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti sattvānāṃ kāyaduḥkhaṃ na cittaduḥkham /
S04bsu032_u:32_0: Sukhs_3 punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ saptabhirvedikābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ
S04bsu032_u:32_1: kiṅkiṇījālaiśca samalaṃkṛtā samantato 'nupatikṣiptā citrā darśanīyā caturṇāṃ ratnānām /
S04bsu032_u:35_0: Sukhs_4 punaraparaṃ śāriputra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau saptaratnamayyaḥ puṣkariṇyaḥ
S04bsu032_u:35_1: - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasya aśmagarbhasya
S04bsu032_u:37: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu samantāccaturdiśaṃ catvāri sopānāni citrāṇi darśanīyāni caturṇāṃ ratnānām - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya /
S04bsu032_u:38_0: tāsāṃ ca puṣkariṇīnāṃ samantādratnavṛkṣā jātāścitrā darśanīyāḥ saptānāṃ ratnānām
S04bsu032_u:38_1: - tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamuktasyāśmagarbhasya
S04bsu032_u:39: tāsu ca puṣkariṇīṣu santi padmāni jātāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni nīlanidarśanāni /
S04bsu032_u:42: Sukhs, Vaidya 255#) avadātāni avadātavarṇāni avadātanirbhāsāni avadātanidarśanāni /
S04bsu032_u:45: Sukhs_5 punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nityapravāditāni divyāni tūryāṇi /
S04bsu032_u:47: tatra ca buddhakṣetre triṣkṛtvo rātrau triṣkṛtvo divasasya puṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣati divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇām /
S04bsu032_u:48: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste ekena purobhaktena koṭiśatasahasraṃ buddhānāṃ vandanti anyāṃllokadhātūn gatvā /
S04bsu032_u:49: ekaikaṃ ca tathāgataṃ koṭiśatasahasrābhiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhirabhyavakīrya punarapi tāmeva lokadhātumāgacchanti divāvihārāya /
S04bsu032_u:51: Sukhs_6 punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre santi haṃsāḥ krauñcā mayūrāśca /
S04bsu032_u:52: te triṣkṛtvo rātro triṣkṛtvo divasasya saṃnipatya saṃgītiṃ kurvanti sma,
S04bsu032_u:55: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhamanasikāra utpadyate,
S04bsu032_u:61: nāmāpi śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre nirayāṇāṃ nāsti,
S04bsu032_u:63: te punaḥ pakṣisaṃghāstenāmitāyuṣā tathāgatena nirmitā dharmaśabdaṃ niścārayanti /
S04bsu032_u:65_0: Sukhs_7 punaraparaṃ śāriputra tatra buddhakṣetre tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca
S04bsu032_u:65_1: kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati - tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra
S04bsu032_u:65_2: koṭiśatasahasrāṅgikasya divyasya tūryasya cāryaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
S04bsu032_u:66: evameva śāriputra tāsāṃ ca tālapaṅktīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca kiṅkiṇījālānāṃ vāteritānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S04bsu032_u:67: tatra teṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā buddhānusmṛtiḥ kāye saṃtiṣṭhati,
S04bsu032_u:71: Sukhs_8 tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitāyurnāmocyate?
S04bsu032_u:72: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasya teṣāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāmaparimitamāyuḥpramāṇam /
S04bsu032_u:74: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasya daśa kalpā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya //
S04bsu032_u:75: Sukhs_9 tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇena sa tathāgato 'mitābho nāmocyate?
S04bsu032_u:76: tasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathāgatasyābhā apratihatā sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu /
S04bsu032_u:78: tasya ca śāriputra tathāgatasyāprameyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho yeṣāṃ na sukaraḥ pramāṇamākhyātuḥ śuddhānāmarhatām /
S04bsu032_u:80_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra ye amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapannāḥ śuddhā
S04bsu032_u:80_1: bodhisattvā avinivartanīyā ekajātipratibaddhāsteṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ na sukaraṃ pramāṇa#
S04bsu032_u:83: tatra khalu punaḥ śāriputra buddhakṣetre sattvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartavyam /
S04bsu032_u:85: yatra hi nāma tathārūpaiḥ satpuruṣaiḥ saha samavadhānaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu032_u:86: nāvaramātrakeṇa śāriputra kuśalamūlena amitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sattvā upapadyante /
S04bsu032_u:87: yaḥ kaścicchāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyati,
S04bsu032_u:89: ekarātraṃ vā dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā catūrātraṃ vā pañcarātraṃ vā ṣaḍrātraṃ vā saptarātraṃ vāvikṣiptacitto manasikariṣyati,
S04bsu032_u:90: yadā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kālaṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu032_u:91: tasya kālaṃ kurvataḥ so 'mitāyustathāgataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtaḥ purataḥ sthāsyati /
S04bsu032_u:93: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
S04bsu032_u:94: tasmāttarhi śāriputra idamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamāna eva vadāmi - satkṛtya kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kartavyam //
S04bsu032_u:95: Sukhs_11 tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi tāṃ parikīrtayāmi,
S04bsu032_u:96: evameva śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi akṣobhyo nāma tathāgato merudhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāmerurnāma tathāgato meruprabhāso nāma tathāgato mañjudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:97: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:99: Sukhs_12 evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi candrasūryapradīpo nāma tathāgato yaśaḥprabho nāma tathāgato mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato merupradīpo nāma tathāgato 'nantavīryo nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:100: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:102_0: Sukhs_13 evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'mitaskandho nāma tathāgato
S04bsu032_u:102_1: 'mitadhvajo nāma tathāgato mahāprabho nāma tathāgato mahāratnaketurnāma tathāgataḥ
S04bsu032_u:103: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:105_0: Sukhs_14 evamuttarāyāṃ diśi mahārciḥskandho nāma tathāgato vaiśvānaranirghoṣo nāma
S04bsu032_u:105_1: tathāgato dundubhisvaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato duṣpradharṣo nāma tathāgataḥ ādityasaṃbhavo
S04bsu032_u:105_2: nāma tathāgato jaleniprabho nāma tathāgataḥ prabhākaro nāma tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu032_u:106: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra uttarāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:108_0: Sukhs_15 Sukhs, Vaidya 257#) evamadhastāyāṃ diśi siṃho nāma tathāgato yaśo nāma
S04bsu032_u:108_1: tathāgato yaśaḥprabhāso nāma tathāgato dharmo nāma tathāgato dharmadharo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu032_u:109: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra adhastāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:111_0: Sukhs_16 evamupariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi brahmaghoṣo nāma tathāgato nakṣatrarājo nāma tathāgata
S04bsu032_u:111_1: indraketudhvajarājo nāma tathāgato gandhottamo nāma tathāgato gandhaprabhāso nāma
S04bsu032_u:111_2: tathāgato mahārciskandho nāma tathāgato ratnakusumasaṃpuṣpitagātro nāma tathāgataḥ
S04bsu032_u:111_3: sālendrarājo nāma tathāgato ratnotpalaśrīrnāma tathāgataḥ sarvārthadarśī nāma tathāgataḥ
S04bsu032_u:112: evaṃpramukhāḥ śāriputra upariṣṭhāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ svakasvakāni buddhakṣetrāṇi jihvendriyeṇa saṃchādayitvā nirveṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
S04bsu032_u:114: Sukhs_17 tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra kena kāraṇenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvabuddhaparigraho nāmocyate?
S04bsu032_u:115: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputra vā kuladuhitaro vā asya dharmaparyāyasya nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti,
S04bsu032_u:116: teṣāṃ va buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu032_u:119: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śraddadhādhvaṃ pratīyatha mā kāṅkṣayatha mama ca teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām /
S04bsu032_u:120: ye kecicchāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasya bhagavato 'mitāyuṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhānaṃ kariṣyanti,
S04bsu032_u:125: tasmāttarhi śāriputra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca tatra buddhakṣetre cittapraṇidhirutpādayitavyaḥ //
S04bsu032_u:126: Sukhs_18 tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra ahametarhi teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayāmi,
S04bsu032_u:127: evameva śāriputra mamāpi te buddhā bhagavanta evamacintyaguṇān parikīrtayanti /
S04bsu032_u:129: sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ kalpakaṣāye sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kleśakaṣāye //
S04bsu032_u:130_0: Sukhs_19 tanmamāpi śāriputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yanmayā sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
S04bsu032_u:130_1: sarvalokavipratyayanīyo dharmo deśitaḥ sattvakaṣāye dṛṣṭikaṣāye kleśakaṣāya āyuṣkaṣāye kalpakaṣāye //
S04bsu032_u:132: āyuṣmān śāriputraste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
